column2: PAE Incorporated, formerly Gores Holdings III, Inc., is a global investment firm. The Company has portfolio of approximately 40 operating companies that serve customers around the world. It invests in Platinum Equity Capital Partners V which is a global buyout fund. The Company also invests in Platinum Equity Small Cap Fund which is a buyout fund focused on investment opportunities in middle market. It specializes in mergers, acquisitions and operations in a range of business markets, including manufacturing, distribution, transportation and logistics, equipment rental, metals services, media and entertainment, technology, and telecommunications.
